user.title: Connect your Ocado account
user.description: Enter your Ocado session and refresh tokens. These must be captured from the Ocado iOS/Android app using a proxy tool like Charles Proxy. Username/password login is not supported. See [{docs_url}]({docs_url}) for instructions.

data_description.session_token: The opaque session token (~100 chars) from the Authorization header
data_description.refresh_token: The RS256 JWT refresh token (starts with eyJ...)

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Ocado
reauth_confirm.description: Your Ocado tokens have expired. Please provide new tokens captured from the Ocado app.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid tokens. Please verify your session and refresh tokens are correct and not expired.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Ocado API. Please check your network connection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Ocado account is already configured.
